scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Collection of (67) colorized glass slides, c. 3x4", Photographed in part and assembled by Devere Allen in Spain, April 1931. Taken in Madrid, Barcelona, and other locations. Includes images of voting, crowds, soldiers, aftermath of political violence, cultural sites and everyday life. For a more detailed description of the slides see the letters of Marie H. Allen, Devere Allen's wife. The letters, written in 1973 and 1975 can be found in the Spanish Refugee Aid Collection (Tamiment #326), New York Office Records, Correspondence, "A" and in the ALBA accessions file.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: Due to their fragile nature, these slides are unavailable to researchers.
